mapper.select: select * from QUERY order by QUERYSEQ
mapper.insert: insert into QUERY (queryseq, open, prodid, cusid, title, content, regdate, reply) values(queryseq.nextval, #{open}, #{prodid}, #{cusid}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, #{reply})
mapper.update: update QUERY set OPEN=#{open}, TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, REPLY=#{reply}
